Velotric Discover 1
Premium quality
commuter meets
affordability
Fully Integrated Design
settings.text: Integrated battery, controller, and front and rear lights

settings.title: We offer a LOT with only $1299.
Fly on Wheels. Fast and Smooth.
settings.text: 500W high performance motor (peak 900W) and a 65Nm torque for a smooth, exciting and effortless riding experience even at 15 degrees uphill.¬†

settings.title: Have More Fun with 50% Longer Range.
settings.text: Equipped with Tesla Grade 48V 15Ah removable battery certified by LG/Samsung, the Velotric Discover 1 features a 50% longer range compared to similar bikes in the market. Up to 60 miles on a single charge.

settings.title: Colorful Design for Your Stylish Ride.
settings.text: The Velotric Discover 1 comes with 5 stylish color options. Pick your mood!

settings.title: Go Beyond Comfort with Ergonomic Design.
settings.content: We optimized every single design detail at the seat, handle, and frame to fit your everyday commute. Straight-back riding posture makes you feel relaxed at all times.

settings.title: Easy to Hop on& off. Accessible to all Riders.
settings.text: Reinforced aluminum step-thru frame so you can easily hop on & off, even with items stored on the rear rack.

settings.title: Ride with the Peace of Mind.
settings.text:
Safety is our most important design philosophy. Not only we certified both our battery and bike with UL, one of the highest safest standards in the ebike industry. We rigorously tested our bikes over 150,000 times under the toughest conditions so that you never have to worry about our quality.¬†

The Discover 1 is equipped with a rear light with braking high-beam function, IPX6 grade waterproof, and double mechanical disc brakes offering riders extra safety in any conditions.

settings.title: The Most Versatile Commuter Ever.
settings.text: The discover 1 can easily adapt to multiple road conditions from road cycling to gravel road allowing you to perform different kinds of activities. The front fork gives you a smooth riding experience in parks, cities, suburbs or no matter where you ride. It is even equipped with a walk mode to assist you to walk up a hill.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.content:
Will I be charged sales tax?

Sales tax will be collected on all orders and will include state and municipal taxes as applicable.

Can I cancel an order once I've placed it?

If order has not shipped, reach out to our CS team and they will help you with order cancellation.

If the order has shipped out from Velotric's warehouse, it will be treated as a return. You will need to contact Velotric Customer Service at help@velotric.bike to receive an RA # and further instructions.

What are shipping costs?

Free shipping includes the 48 contiguous states but not Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico and the other U.S. territories.

What payment methods do you accept?

Visa, MasterCard, and American Express credit cards.

Do you offer exchanges?

If you find that your new Velotric bike isn't right for you, you can return it (in new, unridden/unused condition) within 14 days for a full refund in accordance with our Online Purchase Return Policy.

If you are uncertain about sizing, specifications, or any concerns about the product before ordering, we strongly recommend visiting your local bike shop to get properly fitted and purchasing your bike through them. It's also the best way to help support a local business and have a place to help you in-person for anything in the future.
Do you offer exchanges?

settings.title: Shipping and Return
settings.content:
Shipping policy
Our goal is to offer you the best shipping options, no matter where you live.
The total time is the sum of the processing time and the shipping time.
Processing time:the time between when you place an order and when we ship it.
Shipping time:the time between when your order has been shipped and delivered to you.
Shipping carrier:FedEx
Shipping time: Due to high order volumes, shipment handling time may take as long as 5 weeks (US continental)
Business days refer to Monday~Friday(excluded holidays and weekends), and the time zone is the Eastern Time Zone of USA (GMT-5).
Shipping fee:Free shipping whole store
Shipping from:US Local warehouses
Shipping area:the US only(Exclude Hawaii, Puerto Rico, and Alaska)
Any other question, please contact us at help@velotricbike.com
Return

We have a 14-day return policy, which means you have 14 days after receiving your item to request a return.

Instruction: To start a return, you can contact us at help@velotricbike.com. If your return is accepted, we‚Äôll send you instructions on how and where to send your package. Items sent back to us without first requesting a return will not be accepted. Velotric is not responsible for the shipping cost of the package returned by the customers themselves.

Restocking Fee: you are subject to US$200 per bike restocking fee.

Return Shipping Costs: You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. We recommend using a trackable shipping service and purchasing shipping. We cannot guarantee that we will receive the item you are attempting to return.

Returns are not allowed after 14 days of the delivery date: To be eligible for a return, your item must be in the same condition that you received it, unworn, unused or the ebike must have less than ten (10) miles on the odometer, it and must include all items that were inside the box (charger, keys, hardware, etc.), and in its original packaging. You‚Äôll also need the receipt or proof of purchase.

Damages and issues: Please inspect your order upon reception and contact us immediately if the item is defective, damaged or if you receive the wrong item, so that we can evaluate the issue and make it right.

Return Address: Contact us to get detailed return address

You can always contact us for any return question at help@velotricbike.com

NON-RETURNABLE ITEMS INCLUDE, BUT ARE NOT LIMITED TO:

1. Product from Unauthorized Reseller
2. The damage is caused by human
3. Special order
4. sale items or gift cards

Exchange for new model(Only for Non-quality Products)

This term is only for the unworn, and the ebike must have less than ten (10) miles on the odometer.

settings.title: Will I be charged sales tax?
settings.text: Sales tax will be collected on all orders and will include state and municipal taxes as applicable.

settings.title: Can I cancel an order once I've placed it?
settings.text:
If the order has not shipped, the order can be cancelled for a full refund by contacting Velotric Customer Service at care@velotric.bike.

If the order has shipped out from Velotric's warehouse, it will be treated as a return. You will need to contact Velotric Customer Service at care@velotric.bike to receive an RA # and further instructions.

View full details of the Velotric Online Purchase Return Policy.

settings.title: What are shipping costs?
settings.text: Free shipping includes the 48 contiguous states but not Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico and the other U.S. territories.

settings.title: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.text: Visa, MasterCard, and American Express credit cards.We also offer financing through Affirm.

settings.title: Do you offer exchanges?
settings.text:
If you find that your new Velotric bike isn't right for you, you can return it (in new, unridden/unused condition) within 15 days for a full refund in accordance with our Online Purchase Return Policy.

If you are uncertain about sizing, specifications, or any concerns about the product before ordering, we strongly recommend visiting your local bike shop to get properly fitted and purchasing your bike through them. It's also the best way to help support a local business and have a place to help you in-person for anything in the future.

settings.title: What if i want to replace a part?
settings.text:
Do not how to replace a part for your ebike? No worries, we got step-by-step intuitive replacement video instruction for you.

1. Display

2. Front Light

3. Front Fork

4. Kickstand

5 .Rear Rack

6. Pedal

7. Front Fender

8. Saddle
